meta_info.selection_reason: On Friday, February 13, 2026, despite a $667 million net loss and earnings miss, the stock surged 18% intraday. Self buybacks and regulatory easing expectations covering the bad news - classic 'sell the news, buy the fact' pattern.

seo.title: COIN: $667M Loss Yet 18% Surge? The Real Reason They Shook Out the Small Fries
seo.meta_description: Why did Coinbase (COIN) stock explode despite earnings shock? Institutional sell reports made irrelevant by buybacks and 'Everything Exchange' momentum - urgent analysis.
seo.author: Perplexity Financial Hunter

hook_summary.heading: 3-Second Investment Summary
points: Despite earnings miss and massive loss announcement, strong buyback news triggered 18% intraday reversal surge.
Company itself absorbed Wall Street's target price downgrade selling, solidifying the bottom.
Extreme short-term volatility expected, but regulatory easing momentum alive - 'trading buy' valid.

content.excerpt: When everyone screamed 'sell,' the stock broke through the ceiling. Coinbase covered the worst report card with $600M loss using buyback good news - analyzing Friday's dramatic move.

sections.heading: Market Overview: Bad News Vanishing Act or Dead Cat Bounce?
sections.content: Fear swept early session after earnings missed consensus, then buying flipped sentiment 180°. Investors betting on company's 'regulatory clarity' and 'new platform' future value over immediate loss. Classic bull market trait: stock bounces instantly when bad news hits.

sections.heading: Recent Price Trends & Momentum
sections.content: Stock down 49% past 6 months secured key technical support with this bounce. Post-earnings plunge defended immediately at open shows strong bids waiting. Volume explosion with bullish candle signals short-term bottom potential.

sections.heading: Recent News & Developments
sections.content: Coinbase Q4 revenue $1.78B missed $1.83B expected, EPS $0.66 vs $0.96 anticipated. Management emphasized 'Everything Exchange' launch and early success signs to defend growth story.

sections.heading: Key Catalysts & Risk Factors
sections.content: Stock rose despite JPMorgan slashing targets because 'buybacks' = concrete supply good. Transaction revenue decline persists, crypto market cap down 11% QoQ remains fundamental risk can't ignore.

claims.claim: 암호화폐 시장 시가총액 전분기 대비 11% 감소

sections.heading: Institutional & Insider Activity
sections.content: Main buyer likely the company itself. Buyback program absorbed earnings disappointment selling, successfully defended price. External firms like Benchmark lowering targets staying conservative - company's capital policy likely leads price near term.

sections.heading: Investment Outlook (3–12 Months)
sections.bull_case: If regulatory environment clarifies and new platform settles, current low valuation becomes golden opportunity.
sections.bear_case: If transaction volume decline continues and regulatory uncertainty resurfaces, will retest lows.
sections.strategy: Extreme volatility zone. Better enter on pullbacks in portions to capture buyback effects vs chasing.

claims.claim: 거래 대금 감소 및 순손실 지속 리스크

faq.question: Earnings shock but why did stock rise?
faq.answer: Bad news already priced in perception plus company's buyback announcement powerfully stimulated investor psychology.

faq.question: Safe to enter now?
faq.answer: Short-term surge fatigue possible but favorable to buy dips if you believe long-term regulatory easing story.
